entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Lorraine
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to freezing rain this evening then to rain late this evening. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
